mapper.insert: INSERT INTO supply(supplyNum, supplyQuantity, unitQuantity, unitPrice, harvestDate, state, rescuedApply, coment, farmNum, productNum, varietyNum) VALUES (#{supply_seq.NEXTVAL}, #{supplyQuantity}, #{unitQuantity}, #{unitPrice}, #harvestDate}, 0, 0, #{coment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{farmNum}, #{productNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{varietyNum})
